Talents.Name: Resonator
Talents.Description: Can deploy up to 8 Resonator traps (Can store up to 10); The first enemy that steps on a Resonator will trigger its effect. On deployment, immediately deploys 2 Resonators within Attack Range

Talents.Name: Dreamer
Talents.Description: After a trap activates, <Operator Name> gains +2% ATK, stacking up to 10 times
